title: Suplest Trail mountain bike shoes promise grip, fit & protection, on and off the bike
content:
Suplest has reworked and redefined a third new mountain bike shoe family with their upcoming Trail series. Filling in the gap between their revamped CrossCountry racing shoes and all-new OffRoad flat pedal series, these new Trail shoes split the difference, offering high-quality performance for riders looking for clipless control with extra grip & protection for [â€¦]

The post Suplest Trail mountain bike shoes promise grip, fit & protection, on and off the bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
